## General Instructions
This General Instructions section can be deleted in your final report.

### Commentary
Provide commentary in plain text throughout. Each stage of the munging and analysis process must be described.

### Quotations
Use quotations from the original article, codebook, or data files themselves, to illustrate what you are attempting to reproduce. Quotations should be proceeded by the '>' symbol. For example "> This is a quote from the article" will produce:

> This is a quote from the article.
